import React from "react" import { Container, Nav, Navbar, NavDropdown } from "react-bootstrap" import { LinkContainer } from "react-router-bootstrap" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" const Header = () => { const { userInfo } = useSelector((state) => state.userReducer) const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
shop
{" "} Cart {userInfo ? ( profile ) : ( sign in )}
) } export default Header
